item.description:
Monday Night Jazz in Bushnell Park

Date: Monday, August 3rd, 2009
Time: 6:00 PM

Address: Bushnell Park, Hartford, CT 06103

Jazz in the Park is even better than the Awesomest Thing Ever.
A picnic basket, a bottle of wine (or 5), you and your date or a big group of friends... Sit up close if you're there for the music. Grab a spot further back or over by the Corning Fountain if you're interested in sitting on a blanket while the sun sets and the stars come out, relaxing and having dinner set to the best musical backdrop in the universe.

6:00 pm - Steve Lord Big Band
7:30 pm - Luis Bonilla/Trombonilla

Rain venue is Asylum Hill Congregational Church, 814 Asylum Avenue
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give my # a few days before
